channel.title: First attempt at Photoshop/C4d combination [MODIFIED LINK]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I made this for my friend because I need to start building a portfolio so I can sell on other sites. I want some C4d things to put in there so I attempted this and tell me what you think.
[img]http://i59.tinypic.com/r7ncbn.jpg[/img]

item.title: First attempt at Photoshop/C4d combination [MODIFIED LINK]
item.dc:creator: @ChaoticGFX ChaoticGFX
item.description:
@ChaoticGFX wrote:

Its nice for your first attempt, try to use a set color scheme, add some gradient maps in on photoshop

In the C4D aspect you have good use of the umami plugin(Correct me if Iâ€™m wrong) but the splines your using make a nice effect, try to use a gel style mat for them as it gives a good effect, also calm down on the thrausi side of things, I find clean and simple can look the best, but if you overuse the effect then it can start to look wrong

Other than that its a good first attempt (much better than mine ;P)

KIU

Read full topic
